sentence: We had a suite room that had a nice living room just across the infinity pool
There great with kids and there kids pool is great too
The food was much better than expected and we especially enjoyed the Indonesian amp curry themed buffets by the pool
The room was huge and had 2 bathrooms a living room with sofa bed and a big balcony overlooking the main pool
Rooms were spatias and clean everyone was friendly and the pools and Lounge areas were nice but this is where the positives stop
Excellent amenities are well provided and hotel facilities as the gym business room or the magnificent pool with the sea view makes this hotel one of the best ones in the hospitality industry
The roof top pool was great with a beautiful view overlooking to the beach
Fantastic food and drinks that are well priced and the pools are great too
Food and drinks by the pool also came quite fast
It was clean and the pool overlooked the ocean
So really the only other option was the other pool which was impossible to find a pool lounge from 9 4
Roof top pool was wonderfulI found the rooms to be a little tired but the size was great
Hardly any shade and felt like you were swimming in a big fish pond the way it was tiled out
The pools were dirty and main pool was full of hair and squirrel po
Noticed after day 3 and was not able to swim in the pool for the rest of the holiday
Our room was beside the infinity pool and from early morning we heard the restock and music started playing we where not happy
It was unfortunate that the infinity pool was closed and that I was advised of the club surf only within three days of my stay
The closure of the infinity pool meant that the other pool at the hotel was busy all the time and at times hard to find sun lounges
Stunning pools stayed here few nights very central quite nice but showers were n’t great low water pressure as it ’s a huge resort and there were no menus in our room or drinks in fridge to

The seafood buffet grill again plenty of food but tasteless over cooked the fish was n’t seasoned There were no restaurants with colingThere was 3 pools the roof top poll had no shade there was a kids pool and a pool with nice shaded areas all had bar access The Balinese people are beautiful but the service was very slow The rooms were good clean and spacious The gym the equipment was poor I loved the spa my massage was amazing
